1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Matching parameter.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Para
6  ( -- * Parameter
7    Para (..),
8    Submatch,
9    createPara,
10  ) where
11
12import Prelude hiding (seq, and)
13
14import qualified Data.Map.Strict                   as Map
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Fn       as O
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Bundle    as T
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr      as T
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.MinMax    as T
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator  as T
20
21
22-- | Matching parameter.
23data Para a = Para
24  { paraBundle     :: T.BundleMap a  -- ^ Expression bundle
25  , paraRawSubs    :: [Submatch a]   -- ^ Submatches.
26  , paraGather     :: Bool           -- ^ Gather or skip match result
27  , paraExpr       :: T.Expr a       -- ^ Match expression
28  , paraPos        :: Int            -- ^ Position on input sequence
29  , paraInput      :: [a]            -- ^ Input sequence
30  , paraPrev       :: Maybe a        -- ^ Previous element
31  , paraRawOutput  :: [a]            -- ^ Match result
32  } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
33
34-- | Submatch result, its name and matched sequence.
35type Submatch a = (O.Name, [a])
36
37-- | Create matching parameter from
38--   expression bundle and input sequence.
39createPara :: T.Bundle a -> [a] -> Para a
40createPara bun s =
41    let bun' = simplify bun
42    in Para { paraBundle     = Map.fromList $ T.bundleExpr bun'
43            , paraRawSubs    = []
44            , paraGather     = True
45            , paraExpr       = T.bundleStart bun'
46            , paraPos        = 0
47            , paraInput      = s
48            , paraPrev       = Nothing
49            , paraRawOutput  = [] }
50
51-- | Simplify bundle of match expressions.
52simplify :: T.Bundle a -> T.Bundle a
53simplify bun@T.Bundle { T.bundleExpr = es } =
54    let es' = fmap (what . reduce) <$> es
55    in bun { T.bundleExpr  = es'
56           , T.bundleStart = T.startExpr es' }
57
58-- | Remove redundant expressions.
59reduce :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
60reduce = top where
61    top (T.ERec  r)    = rec r
62    top (T.EBase b)    = T.EBase b
63
64    rec (T.EOr    [])                = T.fail
65    rec (T.ESeq   [])                = T.succ
66    rec (T.EAnd   [])                = T.succ
67    rec (T.ERep (T.MinMax _ 0) _)    = T.succ
68
69    rec (T.EOr   [e])                = top e
70    rec (T.ESeq  [e])                = top e
71    rec (T.EAnd  [e])                = top e
72    rec (T.ERep (T.MinMax 1 1) e)    = top e
73
74    rec (T.ERep m1 (T.ERec (T.ERep m2 e)))
75                       = top $ T.ERec $ T.ERep (T.times m1 m2) e
76
77    rec (T.EOr    es)  = T.or          (top <$> es)
78    rec (T.ESeq   es)  = T.seq         (top <$> es)
79    rec (T.EAnd   es)  = T.and         (top <$> es)
80    rec (T.ENot    e)  = T.not              (top e)
81    rec (T.ERep  m e)  = T.ERec $ T.ERep  m (top e)
82    rec (T.ELast   e)  = T.ERec $ T.ELast   (top e)
83    rec (T.ESub  n e)  = T.ERec $ T.ESub  n (top e)
84    rec (T.EAs   f e)  = T.ERec $ T.EAs   f (top e)
85    rec (T.EGath b e)  = T.ERec $ T.EGath b (top e)
86
87-- | Replace context-dependent operator.
88what :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a
89what = top where
90    top (T.ERec r)     = T.ERec $ rec r
91    top e              = case replaceWhat T.anySeq e of
92                           Nothing -> e
93                           Just e' -> e'  -- ?? = { ? }
94
95    rec (T.EOr  es)    = T.EOr  (top <$> es)
96    rec (T.ESeq es)    = T.ESeq (seq es)
97    rec (T.EAnd es)    = T.EAnd (top <$> es)
98    rec (T.ENot e)     = T.ENot (top e)
99
100    rec (T.ERep  m e)  = T.ERep  m (top e)
101    rec (T.ELast   e)  = T.ELast   (top e)
102    rec (T.ESub  n e)  = T.ESub  n (top e)
103    rec (T.EAs   f e)  = T.EAs   f (top e)
104    rec (T.EGath b e)  = T.EGath b (top e)
105    
106    seq (e1 : es@(e2 : _)) =
107        let rep = replaceWhat $ T.before e2
108        in case (rep e1, rep e2) of
109             (Nothing, _)        -> top e1 : seq es
110             (Just e1', Nothing) -> e1'    : seq es  -- ?? ++ E = before E ++ E
111             (Just _, Just _)    ->          seq es  -- ?? ++ ?? = ??
112    seq [e] = [top e]
113    seq []  = []
114
115replaceWhat :: T.Expr a -> T.Expr a -> Maybe (T.Expr a)
116replaceWhat rep = berryM loop where
117    loop (T.EBase T.EWhat)  = Just rep
118    loop _                  = Nothing
119
120-- | Map to berry expression.
121berryM :: (Monad m) => (T.Expr a -> m (T.Expr a)) -> T.Expr a -> m (T.Expr a)
122berryM f = loop where
123    loop (T.ERec (T.ESub n e))  = return . T.ERec . T.ESub  n =<< loop e
124    loop (T.ERec (T.EGath b e)) = return . T.ERec . T.EGath b =<< loop e
125    loop e = f e
